name: knex-finance-backend
description: KNEX Finance Management System Backend API

scripts.test: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); const mongoose = require('mongoose'); mongoose.connect(process.env.MONGODB_URI).then(() => { console.log('✅ Backend test passed!'); process.exit(0); }).catch(err => { console.error('❌ Backend test failed:', err.message); process.exit(1); });"

author: KNEX Team
